summary: Provides a collection of general-purpose helper utilities for the Metaflow framework, including path encapsulation, temporary directory management, data compression/decompression, CLI option conversion, user and identity resolution, string and byte handling, URL quoting, and other small reusable functions.
business_intent: Facilitate internal Metaflow operations by offering reusable, lowâ€‘level utilities that simplify filesystem interactions, data handling, user identification, and common transformations needed across the library.
